title: Help please, I am unable to play
body:
Recently my monitor died and the only thing available to use was a old TV we had lying around. today I decided to play League again after several months away, however after selecting our champions, instead of the loading screen, my screen went black, all that was on it was in the top left hand corner was:
PC
 4*
(there was 4 of those stars in a line however the forum would not allow me to show this properly, it erases the outside ones and italicizes  everything in between)  
Alt-tab would bring me to my normal screen but no mater what I did I could not get in to the game. I could however interact with it, as I did apologize to my team and I heard the sound of sending a message. Help would be much appreciated.
